article_title: CVS Anti-Tobacco Stance Boosts Hospital, Health System Deals

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: CVS Health (CVS) says its decision last year to stop selling cigarettes and other tobacco products is helping the drugstore chain win more partnerships with hospitals, health systems and some yet-to-be disclosed relationships as well. Such clinical affiliations between pharmacies and their retail clinics are becoming more common as insurance payments [...]
